name: Ext_R5_Medication_in_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Medication.ingredient.item for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Medication.ingredient.item from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The ingredient (substance or medication) that the ingredient.strength relates to
element.definition: The ingredient (substance or medication) that the ingredient.strength relates to.  This is represented as a concept from a code system or described in another resource (Substance or Medication).
element.comment: `Medication.ingredient.item` maps to R4B `Medication.ingredient.item[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
